title: Could we get high-resolution shots from Awaken?
body: Some shots from Awaken (like the final Jhin and Camille shots) are simply so badass but taking a screenshot from Youtube is so hard because of the annoying time bar at the bottom. Is there any way we could get official 4K screenshots from Awaken so we can make some desktop backgrounds??

replies.body: Download it with youtube-dl and grab the frames with a media player.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OQlzE31q,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-22T07:03:04.228+0000)
>
> Download it with youtube-dl and grab the frames with a media player.

Vids are compressed slightly (yes even the highest res ones). You'll never get it as crystal clear as with a real image.

> [{quoted}](name=DUDE BRO,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=OQlzE31q,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-22T09:10:24.700+0000)
>
> Vids are compressed slightly (yes even the highest res ones). You'll never get it as crystal clear as with a real image.

OP seemed mostly bothered by the presence of video controls.
You guys not aware of the LoL Screen Saver app or something?
It's not on League Displays as of yet, the latest ones are only of sylas atm.
Yes but the crux of this is they will be there eventually.
